trans-unit.target: 設定 DSC SMB 提取伺服器

trans-unit.source: Setting up a DSC SMB pull server
trans-unit.target: 設定 DSC SMB 提取伺服器

trans-unit.source: Applies To: Windows PowerShell 4.0, Windows PowerShell 5.0
trans-unit.target: 適用於：Windows PowerShell 4.0、Windows PowerShell 5.0

trans-unit.source: A DSC [SMB](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/hh831795.aspx) pull server is an SMB file share that makes DSC configuration files and/or DSC resources available to target nodes when those nodes ask for them.
trans-unit.target: DSC [SMB](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/hh831795.aspx) 提取伺服器是 SMB 檔案共用，可在目標節點要求時，將 DSC 設定檔及 (或) DSC 資源提供給這些節點使用。

trans-unit.source: To use an SMB pull server for DSC, you have to:
trans-unit.target: 若要針對 DSC 使用 SMB 提取伺服器，您必須︰

trans-unit.source: Set up an SMB file share on a server running PowerShell 4.0 or higher
trans-unit.target: 在執行 PowerShell 4.0 或更新版本的伺服器上設定 SMB 檔案共用

trans-unit.source: Configure a client running PowerShell 4.0 or higher to pull from that SMB share
trans-unit.target: 設定執行 PowerShell 4.0 或更新版本的用戶端從該 SMB 共用提取

trans-unit.source: Using the xSmbShare resource to create an SMB file share
trans-unit.target: 使用 xSmbShare 資源建立 SMB 檔案共用

trans-unit.source: There are a number of ways to set up an SMB file share, but let's look at how you can do this by using DSC.
trans-unit.target: 設定 SMB 檔案共用的方式有幾種，讓我們看看如何使用 DSC 來執行這項作業。

trans-unit.source: Install the xSmbShare resource
trans-unit.target: 安裝 xSmbShare 資源

trans-unit.source: Call the [Install-Module](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/dn807162.aspx) cmdlet to install the **xSmbShare** module.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 [Install-Module](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/dn807162.aspx) Cmdlet 安裝 **xSmbShare** 模組。

trans-unit.source: **Note**: **Install-Module** is included in the **PowerShellGet** module, which is included in PowerShell 5.0.
trans-unit.target: **注意**：**Install-Module** 已納入 **PowerShellGet** 模組，其隨附於 PowerShell 5.0。

trans-unit.source: You can download the **PowerShellGet** module for PowerShell 3.0 and 4.0 at [PackageManagement PowerShell Modules Preview](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=49186).
trans-unit.target: 您可以在 [PackageManagement PowerShell 模組預覽](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=49186)下載 PowerShell 3.0 和 4.0 的 **PowerShellGet** 模組。

trans-unit.source: The **xSmbShare** contains the DSC resource **xSmbShare**, which can be used to create an SMB file share.
trans-unit.target: **XSmbShare** 包含 DSC 資源 **xSmbShare**，可用來建立 SMB 檔案共用。

trans-unit.source: Create the directory and file share
trans-unit.target: 建立目錄和檔案共用

trans-unit.source: The following configuration uses the [File](fileResource.md) resource to create the directory for the share, and the **xSmbShare** resource to set up the SMB share:
trans-unit.target: 下列設定使用 [File](fileResource.md) 資源為共用建立目錄，並使用 **xSmbShare** 設定 SMB 共用︰

trans-unit.source: The configuration creates the directory `C:\DscSmbShare` if it doesn't already exists, and then uses that directory as an SMB file share.
trans-unit.target: 此設定會建立目錄 `C:\DscSmbShare` (如果尚未存在)，然後使用該目錄作為 SMB 檔案共用。

trans-unit.source: **FullAccess** should be given to any account that needs to write to or delete from the file share, and **ReadAccess** must be given to any client nodes that will get configurations and/or DSC resources from the share ( this is because DSC runs as the system account by default, so the computer itself has to have access to the share).
trans-unit.target: **FullAccess** 應該授予需要寫入檔案共用或從中刪除的任何帳戶，而 **ReadAccess** 必須授予會從共用取得設定且 (或) DSC 資源的任何用戶端節點 (這是因為 DSC 預設會以系統帳戶執行，因此電腦本身必須具有共用的存取權)。

trans-unit.source: Give file system access to the pull client
trans-unit.target: 將檔案系統存取權授與提取用戶端

trans-unit.source: Giving **ReadAccess** to a client node allows that node to access the SMB share, but not to files or folders within that share.
trans-unit.target: 將 **ReadAccess** 授與用戶端節點可讓該節點存取 SMB 共用，但無法存取該共用內的檔案或資料夾。

trans-unit.source: You have to explicitly grant client nodes access to the SMB share folder and sub-folders.
trans-unit.target: 您必須明確授與 SMB 共用資料夾和子資料夾的用戶端節點存取權。

trans-unit.source: We can do this with DSC by adding using the **cNtfsPermissionEntry** resource, which is contained in the [CNtfsAccessControl](https://www.powershellgallery.com/packages/cNtfsAccessControl/1.2.0) module.
trans-unit.target: 我們可以透過 DSC 來達成，方法是使用 [CNtfsAccessControl](https://www.powershellgallery.com/packages/cNtfsAccessControl/1.2.0) 模組中所包含的 **cNtfsPermissionEntry** 資源來新增。

trans-unit.target: 下列設定會新增 **cNtfsPermissionEntry** 區塊，將 ReadAndExecute 存取權授與提取用戶端︰

trans-unit.source: Placing configurations and resources
trans-unit.target: 放置設定和資源

trans-unit.source: Save any configuration MOF files and/or DSC resources that you want client nodes to pull in the SMB share folder.
trans-unit.target: 儲存您想要用戶端節點提取到 SMB 共用資料夾的任何設定 MOF 檔案及 (或) DSC 資源。

trans-unit.source: Any configuration MOF file must be named _ConfigurationID_.mof, where _ConfigurationID_ is the value of the **ConfigurationID** property of the target node's LCM.
trans-unit.target: 任何設定 MOF 檔案必須命名為 _ConfigurationID_.mof，其中 _ConfigurationID_ 是目標節點 LCM 的 **ConfigurationID** 屬性值。

trans-unit.source: For more information about setting up pull clients, see [Setting up a pull client using configuration ID](pullClientConfigID.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關設定提取用戶端的詳細資訊，請參閱[使用設定識別碼設定提取用戶端](pullClientConfigID.md)。

trans-unit.source: **Note:** You must use configuration IDs if you are using an SMB pull server.
trans-unit.target: **注意**︰如果您使用 SMB 提取伺服器，就必須使用設定識別碼。

trans-unit.source: Configuration names are not supported for SMB.
trans-unit.target: SMB 不支援設定名稱。

trans-unit.source: Any resources needed by the client must be placed in the SMB share folder as archived `.zip` files.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端所需的任何資源都必須以封存的 `.zip` 檔案形式，放置在 SMB 共用資料夾中。

trans-unit.source: Creating the MOF checksum
trans-unit.target: 建立 MOF 總和檢查碼

trans-unit.source: A configuration MOF file needs to be paired with a checksum file so that an LCM on a target node can validate the configuration.
trans-unit.target: 設定 MOF 檔案需要與總和檢查碼檔案配對，以便目標節點上的 LCM 可驗證設定。

trans-unit.source: To create a checksum, call the [New-DSCCheckSum](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/dn521622.aspx) cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立總和檢查碼，請呼叫 [New-DSCCheckSum](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/dn521622.aspx) Cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet takes a **Path** parameter that specifies the folder where the configuration MOF is located.
trans-unit.target: 此 Cmdlet 會使用 **Path** 參數，指定設定 MOF 所在的資料夾。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet creates a checksum file named `ConfigurationMOFName.mof.checksum`, where `ConfigurationMOFName` is the name of the configuration mof file.
trans-unit.target: 此 Cmdlet 會建立名為 `ConfigurationMOFName.mof.checksum` 的總和檢查碼檔案，其中 `ConfigurationMOFName` 是設定 MOF 檔案的名稱。

trans-unit.source: If there are more than one configuration MOF files in the specified folder, a checksum is created for each configuration in the folder.
trans-unit.target: 如果在指定的資料夾中有多個設定 MOF 檔案，就會在每個設定資料夾中各建立一個總和檢查碼。

trans-unit.source: The checksum file must be present in the same directory as the configuration MOF file (`$env:PROGRAMFILES\WindowsPowerShell\DscService\Configuration` by default), and have the same name with the `.checksum` extension appended.
trans-unit.target: 總和檢查碼檔案必須存在於和設定 MOF 檔案相同的目錄中 (預設為 `$env:PROGRAMFILES\WindowsPowerShell\DscService\Configuration`)，而且具有相同名稱，附加副檔名為 `.checksum`。

trans-unit.source: **Note**: If you change the configuration MOF file in any way, you must also recreate the checksum file.
trans-unit.target: **注意**：如果您以任何方式變更設定 MOF 檔案，也必須重新建立總和檢查碼檔案。
